short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FlareGet Browser Integration extension replaces default download manager of Google Chrome by Flareget Download Manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Official extension to integrate Chrome with Flareget Download Manager.


In order to prevent Flareget from taking over the download, just press hold 'Insert' or 'F' or 'Shift' or 'Alt' key.
